name: LOST CAT (BasiliCool)
description:
The lab looks empty. 

These boxes... are they empty?

Wait a minute.

Where did Shrodi go?

He's not dead, I'm sure.

There's only one way to find out....

===========================

CONTROLS

===========================

When Alive - WASD

When Dead - Arrow Keys

Switch between states - Spacebar

Mouse to select levels, click buttons etc

Alt + Enter - Fullscreen

==========================

Game made for the "ScoreSpace Jam #16".

The game was not tested enough, doesn't have a SAVE/LOAD function and the score for each level gets back to 0 if you try to re-run a level.

There is no music, sadly.

SFX from https://mixkit.co/

Cover made by @tac0s_man.
